termsOfUse.title: Terms of Use
termsOfUse.introduction: Welcome to ParkFlow. These Terms of Use govern your access to and use of our parking management platform. By accessing or using ParkFlow, you agree to be bound by these terms.

section1.title: Acceptance of Terms
section1.content1: By creating an account or using any part of the ParkFlow service, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Use and our Privacy Policy.
section1.content2: If you do not agree to these terms, you must not access or use our services. We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time, and your continued use constitutes acceptance of any changes.

section2.title: Service Description
section2.content1: ParkFlow is a comprehensive parking management platform that allows users to monitor, manage, and optimize parking spaces. Our service includes real-time monitoring, analytics, user management, and reporting features.
section2.content2: We strive to maintain service availability but do not guarantee uninterrupted access. Scheduled maintenance and unexpected technical issues may temporarily affect service availability.

section3.title: User Responsibilities
section3.content1: As a user of ParkFlow, you agree to:
section3.list1: Provide accurate and complete information when creating your account
section3.list2: Maintain the security of your login credentials
section3.list3: Use the service only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms
section3.list4: Not attempt to interfere with or disrupt our services or servers

section4.title: Intellectual Property
section4.content1: All content, features, and functionality of ParkFlow, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, icons, images, and software, are the exclusive property of ParkFlow and are protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.
section4.content2: You may not reproduce, distribute, modify, or create derivative works of any content without our prior written consent.

section5.title: Limitation of Liability
section5.content1: ParkFlow provides the service 'as is' and makes no warranties, express or implied, regarding the service's reliability, accuracy, or fitness for a particular purpose.
section5.content2: In no event shall ParkFlow be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of your use of the service.

section6.title: Termination
section6.content1: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account at any time for violation of these terms or for any other reason at our sole discretion. Upon termination, your right to use the service will cease immediately.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: At ParkFlow, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you use our parking management platform.

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.content: We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide when using our service, including:
personalInfo.list1: Name, email address, and contact information
personalInfo.list3: Payment information (processed securely through third-party providers)

automaticInfo.title: Automatically Collected Information
automaticInfo.content: We automatically collect certain technical information when you use ParkFlow, including IP addresses, browser type, device information, usage patterns, and performance metrics to improve our service.

section2.title: How We Use Your Information
section2.content1: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
section2.list1: Providing and maintaining our parking management services
section2.list2: Processing transactions and managing your account
section2.list3: Sending important service updates and notifications
section2.list4: Improving our platform based on usage analytics
section2.list5: Providing customer support and responding to inquiries

section3.title: Information Sharing
section3.content1: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:
section3.list1: With service providers who assist in operating our platform
section3.list2: When required by law or legal proceedings
section3.list3: To protect our rights, property, or safety, or that of our users

section4.title: Data Security
section4.content1: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
section4.content2: However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

section5.title: Your Rights
section5.content1: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:
section5.list1: Access and review your personal data
section5.list3: Request deletion of your personal data
section5.list4: Withdraw consent for processing where applicable

section6.title: Data Retention
section6.content1: We retain your personal information only as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations. When data is no longer needed, we securely delete or anonymize it.

section7.title: Changes to This Policy
section7.content1: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the effective date.

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.introduction: This Cookie Policy explains how ParkFlow uses cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience on our parking management platform. By using our service, you consent to our use of cookies as described in this policy.

section1.title: What Are Cookies
section1.content1: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our website or use our application. They help us remember your preferences, improve functionality, and analyze how our service is used.

section2.title: Types of Cookies We Use
section2.intro: We use several types of cookies to provide and improve our service:

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the basic functionality of ParkFlow, including user authentication, security, and core platform features.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: We use these cookies to understand how users interact with our platform, helping us improve performance and user experience.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: These cookies remember your preferences and settings, such as language selection, theme preferences, and dashboard configurations.

advertising.title: Advertising Cookies
advertising.description: We may use these cookies to deliver relevant advertisements and measure the effectiveness of our marketing campaigns.

section3.title: How We Use Cookies
section3.content1: We use cookies for the following purposes:
section3.list1: Authenticating users and maintaining secure sessions
section3.list5: Improving our services based on user behavior

section4.title: Third-Party Cookies
section4.content1: Some cookies on our platform are set by third-party services we use, such as analytics providers and payment processors. These third parties have their own privacy policies governing their use of cookies.
section4.noteContent: We do not control third-party cookies and recommend reviewing the privacy policies of these services.

section5.title: Managing Your Cookie Preferences
section5.content1: You can control and manage cookies in several ways:

browserSettings.title: Browser Settings
browserSettings.chrome: Chrome: Settings > Privacy and security > Cookies and other site data
browserSettings.firefox: Firefox: Preferences > Privacy & Security > Cookies and Site Data
browserSettings.safari: Safari: Preferences > Privacy > Manage Website Data
browserSettings.edge: Edge: Settings > Cookies and site permissions

section6.title: Updates to This Cookie Policy
section6.content1: We may update this Cookie Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or applicable laws. Please review this policy regularly to stay informed about our use of cookies.

header.title: Garage Management
header.description: Manage access points for cooperative users, activate or deactivate garage spaces. Register new users and track the payment balance of each cooperative member.

modal.garageFreeDescription: This garage is not occupied. You can assign it to a user.

header.title: Statistics section
header.description: In this section, you can view your statistics for your garage cooperative. You will be able to track number of debts, total amount of vacant garages, and other statistics for convenient and comfortable administration. For convenience, the statistics are provided in the form of graphs and cards, making it easy to analyze performance across different criteria.
